plot: A year before the battle of Sekigahara that ended the Sengoku Period, the ninja Kirigakure Saizou meets the miko Isanami as she's attacked by assassins. Her shrine was destroyed by Ieyasu Tokugawa for siding with Sanada Yukimura. Meanwhile, Sanada has been gathering ten warriors known as Sanada's Brave 10, who have the power to change history. As they gather one by one, Isanami's own mysterious power awakens.
opening_theme: "Seirei Hirai" (精霊飛来) by Daisuke Ono and Tetsuya Kakihara
"Tenka o Odoru" (天下を躍る) by Toshiyuki Morikawa and Hiroshi Kamiya (eps 3, 7)
